definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Wash the instant noodles with warm water first, stir it and pour away the water containing the wax coating。
sentences.chinese: 用温水冲洗方便面，搅拌，然后倒掉含有蜡涂层的水。

sentences.english: Instant noodles, which Chinese like to eat dry, were thirty cents.
sentences.chinese: 中国人喜欢干吃的方便面，只要30美分。

sentences.english: This department staff denied flatly the instant noodles card to have exchange a prize saying.

sentences.english: First, the noodles must be placed in a bowl with about five hundred milliliters of boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 首先，用大约500毫升的沸水将方便面泡在碗里。

sentences.english: I cursed you for a lifetime to buy instant noodles without seasoning packets.
sentences.chinese: 我诅咒你一辈子买方便面没有调料包。

sentences.english: Therefore, I returned to my dormitory to fetch my bowl with my instant noodles in it.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我回自己宿舍拿我的碗和方便面。

sentences.english: Instant noodles are great to eat no matter what the situation may be.
sentences.chinese: 在任何情况下方便面都是食用佳品。

sentences.english: Entire the maintenance closing dyadic machinery structure, operation safety, being maintained goes to the lavatory .

sentences.english: During stops for meals, he would light the gas stove and cook instant noodles.
sentences.chinese: 等待进餐期间，他会打开煤气炉去煮方便面。

sentences.english: The quality of potato instant noodle is based on the percentage of the potato flakes.
sentences.chinese: 马铃薯全粉的添加对马铃薯方便面的质量有影响。

sentences.english: Everyone who has eaten  instant noodles before knows how it looks like.
sentences.chinese: 每个人吃过方便面的人都知道它长啥样。
所以我只好改做方便面。

sentences.english: The invention also relates to a dry mixing instant noodle bowl using the water-filter bowl cover.
sentences.chinese: 本发明还涉及一种使用上述滤水碗盖的干拌方便面碗。

sentences.english: This kind of instant noodle is preservative-free.
sentences.chinese: 这种方便面不含防腐剂。

definition: spicy sticks, a snack food similar to beef jerky but made with flour or dried beancurd instead of meat
